snippet: IBM and Harley-Davidson shares were down after their quarterly reports disappointed investors.
abstract: Three-day winning streak in United States stock market ends due to weak company reports and projections.
lead_paragraph: IBM and Harley-Davidson shares were down after their quarterly reports disappointed investors.

headline.print_headline: Market Declines Slightly as Investors Decode Earnings at U.S. Corporations
headline.main: Market Lower as Some Companies Report Weak Earnings
